resources.string:
I\'m Nijat and I\'m Front-End and Mobile Developer I am studying Computer Engineering(EN) at Baku Engineering University. I participate at some programming contests such as ICPC NERC, Google Hashcode, PasaBank Cup. Practised in Front-End and Mobile App Development and have real projects. Build some cross platform (Android and IOS) mobile applications. I am also alumni of Mobile Development from IBA Tech Academy (DAN IT education)
I have a few web projects. These are technologies that I use in this projects: HTML for main structure, CSS for styling elements, JavaScript to add functionality to the project; another technologies that I used for web are React(SCSS, styled components for styling element) and Redux for data state management. I have also Mobile App projects for both platforms Android and IOS. For creating simple page applications, I used React Native(special library of JavaScript for cross-platform Mobile Applications), Redux and Firebase (as a storage and backend)
